00038 SCA_EventManager::SCA_EventManager(SCA_LogicManager* logicmgr, EVENT_MANAGER_TYPE mgrtype)
00039     :m_logicmgr(logicmgr),
00040     m_mgrtype(mgrtype)
00041 {
00042 }
00043 
00044 
00045 
00046 SCA_EventManager::~SCA_EventManager()
00047 {
00048     // all sensors should be removed
00049     assert(m_sensors.Empty());
00050 }
00051 
00052 void SCA_EventManager::RegisterSensor(class SCA_ISensor* sensor)
00053 {
00054     m_sensors.AddBack(sensor);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void SCA_EventManager::RemoveSensor(class SCA_ISensor* sensor)
00058 {
00059     sensor->Delink();
00060 }
00061 
00062 void SCA_EventManager::NextFrame(double curtime, double fixedtime)
00063 {
00064     NextFrame();
00065 }
00066 
00067 void SCA_EventManager::NextFrame()
00068 {
00069     assert(false); // && "Event managers should override a NextFrame method");
00070 }
00071 
00072 void SCA_EventManager::EndFrame()
00073 {
00074 }
00075 
00076 void SCA_EventManager::UpdateFrame()
00077 {
00078 }

00080 int SCA_EventManager::GetType()
00081 {
00082     return (int) m_mgrtype;
